Articles.Content: Anyone else wonder why Val is off by herself in space on the second page of the start menu with a depressing look on her face?
Because unlike Jeb and co., she's realized that they left the keys to the VAB back on the surface of Eve. They're gonna get an earful from Wernher and Gene Kerman when they get back.

> 
> Anyone else wonder why Val is off by herself in space on the second page of the start menu with a depressing look on her face?

It is weird. Especially since, in the 1.0 demo version of the title screen replacing one of the guys who was previously there.

I don't think those Kerbals are any of the orange suits, they're all rather emotionless compared to Jeb and Bill and Bob and Val.

I think it was done to kinda reveal that female Kerbals were new, and to make her stand out.

But I agree it almost looks like she's segregated from the others :/

Maybe she's sulking because she's sad that no females work in the admin office.
Hey, have you never been to a rock concert? The band members all come on first, then the Rockstar.![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
While Val is a badass, she still has intelligence compared to the other orange suits. She's probably thinking *I'm surrounded by idiots.*

I noticed that too. She looks sorta... dead-eyed. Not all there. All the kerbals on that scene need some attention I think, and random animations like on the lunar scene (doing somersalts or something)

Another idea - pop her on the Mun in the other menu scene. Maybe as The Builder Of The Castle, maybe as another kerbal trying to dig out the lander with a sample scoop or whatever is available.
Yeah, she looks kinda lonely and creppy in the second menu screen.

> Maybe she's sulking because she's sad that no females work in the admin office.

Or the VAB/SPH.
She's judging you. The amount of time that you take to make a decision here may be indicative of the effort/lack thereof that you put into your missions.

The title made me realize how much Valentina must love val. And bob love bop. And Jeb love jool. and bill...love...?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-01T12:39:54Z" title="05/01/2015 12:39  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 1, 2015</time> by DuoDex**
  
removed inappropriate references

> 
> While Val is a badass, she still has intelligence compared to the other orange suits. She's probably thinking *I'm surrounded by idiots.*

^ This 

Honestly it's kinda ironically realistic.. A female of her intellect is going to distance herself and roll her eyes when there are 3 boys goofing off in a situation that should be more serious..

> 
> While Val is a badass, she still has intelligence compared to the other orange suits. She's probably thinking *I'm surrounded by idiots.*

She's my test pilot. She can't possibly be too smart either or she wouldn't have taken the job in the first place
I think it's more that someone pulled a mean practical joke on her and added something smelly to her oxium tank. That's more what it looks like to me.

I think it's because she's just new to the group. Jeb, Bob, and Bill have spent so many game decades cooped up together in a command pod, otherwise alone in the vastness of space, that they've lost any real sense that other Kerbals even exist, and feel uncomfortable being out of arm's reach of each other. This naturally makes them seem rather off-putting to everybody else on those rare occasions when they're home. So they're not yet really aware of Val, and Val thinks they're weird, and they all dread the fact that at some point they'll have to mingle.

> 
> Anyone else wonder why Val is off by herself in space on the second page of the start menu with a depressing look on her face?

The way I interpreted the transition from the camera shot of a group of males to the weird looking Val, was that they were all staring at her creepily due to her being the first female Kerbal they've ever seen, and her looking very nervous as a result.

She's having cramps. Cramps in space. 

Naturally she's not amused.
Space cramps!?

> 
> While Val is a badass, she still has intelligence compared to the other orange suits. She's probably thinking *I'm surrounded by idiots.*

I think this is the best answer... Can you honestly imagine working with the other 3.. ? ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif)

> 
> I think this is the best answer... Can you honestly imagine working with the other 3.. ? ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif)

Or with us ...
Well technically there's only 1 kerbal standing on the Mun menu too...
Because you can only fit 3 kerbals in the command pod and she drew short straw XD
Val is nothing more then a rip off of Jeb. its kind of sad that they didnt try and make her original nope lets just make a carbon coby of jeb with boobs so interesting.

> 
> Val is nothing more then a rip off of Jeb. its kind of sad that they didnt try and make her original nope lets just make a carbon coby of jeb with boobs so interesting.

She doesn't have to be interesting if she has bewbs, every man knows that.
